item.description:
Chris is holding this meetup with this great topic.  More than ever, today negativity is all around us, and believe me when I tell you that it does impact all of us.

 

Negativity and YOU!!

Wednesday, June 29, 2011

6:00 PM

Marlborough Public Library    35 West Main Street Marlborough, MA

Added this Meetup on Jun 14, 2011

Who's hosting?

Chris Adshade---Central Mass Hypnosis and NLP Meetup Group

Price: $5.00 per person

How to find us: Story Hour room down stairs of the library

 

Negativity and YOU!

 

How does it affect you and what can you do about it??

Do you know someone who seems to be negative all the time?  How they seem to get everyone talking negative and change the atmosphere in a matter of minutes?  In our society we all tend to jump on the negative bandwagon and we are quick to criticize and judge.  It is rare that one stands up against that because we seem to get sucked into it. 

Or on the other hand do people find you negative alot of the time?  Its harder to see it in ourselves.  If you can detect when you are being negative what do you do to change it or do you?  Or do you go on a rant of negative comments and feelings about someone or something? 

This meetup will be discussing when we find ourselves being negative........as well as when we find others being negative around us and how it makes us feel.  We will be doing an amazing hypnosis process to Undo Negativity that will benefit you as well as the people you come into contact with! 

This is a topic that has been requested in the past by many people.....why?....well thats simple....it is in everyone's lives!  So come on out and start to UNDO that negativity!
item.how_to_find_us: Story Hour room down stairs of the library (yes, "Story Hour")

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Negativity and YOU! with Chris Adshade
